name: The Light (itch)
description:
Dive in a dark forest and bring back the light !

The Light is a 2D platformer taking place in a grey shaded world. You are Legba, a voodoo brought to life by a sorcerer and will have to face many danger in the woods to vanquish the darkness and bring back the light.

The Light was made at Gamagora, Lyon, France, by a team of 16 video game students, during a 3 month project.
